meanings.definition: The act of delivering something beforehand.
meanings.sent1: The predeliveries of the packages ensured they arrived on time.
meanings.sent2: The company's efficient predeliveries system helped streamline the shipping process.
meanings.sent3: The predeliveries of the birthday presents made the surprise even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her predeliveries of good news always lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The predeliveries of fresh flowers brightened up the room before the event.

meanings.definition: The state of being delivered before the expected time.
meanings.sent1: The predeliveries of the online orders surprised the customers with their speed.
meanings.sent2: The predeliveries of the groceries made life easier for many busy families.
meanings.sent3: The predeliveries of the snowstorm caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: His predeliveries of jokes always brought laughter to the room.
meanings.sent5: The predeliveries of the exam results caused both anxiety and relief among the students.
